General.Name: Boldt S.A
General.Description: Boldt S.A. engages in the administration, management, and exploitation of casinos and electronic gaming machines in Argentina. It is also involved in the entertainment and hotel; printing of documentation referring to the identification of people and/or goods; management and conservation of cadasters; gastronomy; cars and vehicles storage; and exploitation and/or commercialization of real estate, as well as construction and engineering works. In addition, the company offers telecommunications services. Boldt S.A. was incorporated in 1943 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
General.Address: Aristóbulo del Valle 1257, Buenos Aires, Argentina
